content: A company known for transferring money, "no wire unsent" is an anagram for this business name.

Western Union is the business name you're thinking of. The phrase "no wire unsent" is indeed an anagram for "Western Union." Western Union is a well-known company that provides money transfer services, among other financial services, and has been in operation for over 150 years. Their signature service allows people to send money to recipients quickly and easily, often in person or through online platforms. The slogan "no wire unsent" emphasizes their reliability and the fact that once a money transfer is initiated, it is successfully completed without failure.
